controllers package

Submodules

controllers.sales_controller module

controllers.sales_controller.get_all_sales()[source]

Fetch all sales records.

Returns:

JSON response with all sales data or an error message.

Return type:

tuple

controllers.sales_controller.get_available_goods()[source]

Fetch a list of available goods in the inventory.

Returns:

JSON response with a list of available goods or an error message.

Return type:

tuple

controllers.sales_controller.get_details_of_item(item_name)[source]

Fetch details for a specific item.

Parameters:

item_name (str) – The name of the item.

Returns:

JSON response with item details or an error message.

Return type:

tuple

controllers.sales_controller.get_sales_by_customer(customer_id)[source]

Fetch all sales records for a specific customer.

Parameters:

customer_id (int) – The ID of the customer.

Returns:

JSON response with sales data for the customer or an error message.

Return type:

tuple

controllers.sales_controller.health_check()[source]

Check the health of the sales service.

Returns:

JSON response indicating service health and database connection status.

Return type:

tuple

controllers.sales_controller.make_sale()[source]

Process a sale by deducting inventory and charging the customer.

Returns:

JSON response with sale details or an error message.

Return type:

tuple
